fields.name: jdc_person_id
fields.title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
fields.description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

fields.name: visit_number
fields.title: Visit Number
fields.description: A number that identifies the visit or timepoint of data collection (baseline=1 and each subsequent follow up is 2 or greater).

fields.name: visit_type
fields.title: Visit Type
fields.description: The visit type/category (either baseline or follow up)

fields.name: s1a
fields.title: Last time drug use
fields.description: Last time a person used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often?

fields.name: s1b
fields.title: Last time drug use: getting, using, or recovering
fields.description: Last time a person spent a lot of time either getting alcohol or other drugs, using alcohol or other drugs, or recovering from the effects of alcohol or other drugs (feeling sick)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you spent a lot of time either getting alcohol or other drugs, using alcohol or other drugs, or recovering from the effects of alcohol or other drugs (feeling sick)?

fields.name: s1c
fields.title: Last time drug use: social dysfunction
fields.description: Last time a person kept using alcohol or other drugs even though it was causing social  problems, leading to fights, or getting you into trouble with other people

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you kept using alcohol or other drugs even though it was causing social   problems, leading to fights, or getting you into trouble with other people?

fields.name: s1d
fields.title: Last time drug use: work or life dysfunction
fields.description: Last time a person's use of alcohol or other drugs caused giving up or reducing involvement in activities at work, school, home or social events

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time your use of alcohol or other drugs caused you to give up or reduce your involvement in activities at work, school, home or social events?

fields.name: s1e
fields.title: Last time drug use: withdrawal
fields.description: Last time a person had withdrawal problems from alcohol or other drugs like shaky hands, throwing up, having trouble sitting still or sleeping, or used any  alcohol or other drugs to stop being sick or avoid withdrawal problems

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you had withdrawal problems from alcohol or other drugs like shaky hands, throwing up, having trouble sitting still or sleeping, or you used any  alcohol or other drugs to stop being sick or avoid withdrawal problems?

fields.name: s2a
fields.title: Last time drug use: any opioids
fields.description: Last time a person used any kind of heroin, fentanyl, or other opioid

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you used any kind of heroin, fentanyl or other opioid?(such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)?

fields.name: s2b
fields.title: Last time drug use: opioid overdose
fields.description: Last time a person had an opioid overdose

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you had an opioid overdose? [used enough of the drug that it produced a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention]

fields.name: s2c
fields.title: Last time drug use: OUD medication-assisted treatment
fields.description: Last time a person had a medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorder

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you went to any kind of medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorder?

fields.name: s3a
fields.title: Opioid Overdose Count
fields.description: Number of times a person overdosed on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you overdose on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids?  [Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention]

fields.name: s3b
fields.title: Opioid Overdose Count: Receiving Naloxone
fields.description: Number of times a person received naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you receive naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose?

fields.name: s3c
fields.title: Person Who Administered Nalaxone for Overdose
fields.description: People who administered naloxone or narcan

custom.notes: TODO: expand fields to each of the possible selections
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Who administered the naloxone or Narcan? (SELECT ALL THAT APPLY)

fields.name: s3d
fields.title: Drugs 4 hrs Before Overdose
fields.description: Drugs taken in the 4 hours before overdose

custom.notes: TODO: expand fields to each of the possible selections
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: What drugs had you taken in the 4 hours before you overdosed? (SELECT ALL THAT APPLY)

fields.name: s3e
fields.title: Emergency Medical Service Following Overdose
fields.description: Number of times a person received emergency medical service following an overdose

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you receive emergency medical service following an overdose?

fields.name: s3f
fields.title: Emergency Department Visit Count Following Overdose
fields.description: Number of times a person went to the emergency department following an overdose

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you go to the emergency department following an overdose?

fields.name: s3g
fields.title: Hospital Admissions Count Following Overdose
fields.description: Number of times a person got admitted to the hospital following an overdose

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you get admitted to the hospital following an overdose?

fields.name: s3h
fields.title: Substance Use Treatment Referral Count Following Overdose
fields.description: Number of times a person received a referral to substance use treatment from the police, EMS, ED or hospital staff

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you receive a referral to substance use treatment from the police, EMS, ED or hospital staff?

fields.name: s4a
fields.title: Drug Use Count
fields.description: Number of times a person used any heroin, fentanyl, opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other illicit drugs  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any heroin, fentanyl, opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other illicit drugs?

fields.name: s4b
fields.title: Alcohol Use Count
fields.description: Number of times a person drank any kind of alcohol (beer, gin, rum, scotch, tequila, whiskey, wine or mixed drinks)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you drink any kind of alcohol (beer, gin, rum, scotch, tequila, whiskey, wine or mixed drinks)?

fields.name: s4c
fields.title: Alcohol Use Count: Binge Drinking
fields.description: Number of times a person had 5 or more drinks during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you have 5 or more drinks?

fields.name: s4d
fields.title: Marijuana use count: medical
fields.description: Number of times a person used medical marijuana that was obtained from a dispensary with their own recommendation card or prescription during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use medical marijuana that was obtained from a dispensary with your own recommendation card or prescription?

fields.name: s4e
fields.title: Marijuana use count: Not own
fields.description: Number of times a person used other marijuana, including hashish, edibles, tinctures or concentrated drops, blunts or other forms of THC (cannabis, herb, pot, reefer, weed), or medical marijuana that was not their own

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use other marijuana, including hashish, edibles, tinctures or concentrated drops, blunts or other forms of THC (cannabis, herb, pot, reefer, weed), or medical marijuana that was not your own?

fields.name: s4f
fields.title: Opioid use count: Heroin
fields.description: Number of times a person used heroin (alone or mixed with other drugs) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use heroin (alone or mixed with other drugs)?

fields.name: s4g
fields.title: Opioid use count: Fentanyl
fields.description: Number of times a person used fentanyl (alone or mixed with other drugs)  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use fentanyl (alone or mixed with other drugs)?

fields.name: s4h
fields.title: Opioid use count: Street Methadone
fields.description: Number of times a person used nonprescription or street methadone  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use nonprescription or street methadone?

fields.name: s4j
fields.title: Opioid use count: Suboxone
fields.description: Number of times a person used nonprescription or street Suboxone  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use use nonprescription or street Suboxone?

fields.name: s4k
fields.title: Opioid use count: other
fields.description: Number of times a person used other opioids, opiates, painkillers, or other analgesics (such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use other opioids, opiates, painkillers, or other analgesics (such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)?

fields.name: s4m
fields.title: Cocaine use count
fields.description: Number of times a person used crack, smoked rock, freebase, or other forms of cocaine during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use crack, smoked rock, freebase, or other forms of cocaine?

fields.name: s4n
fields.title: Speed use count
fields.description: Number of times a person used any methamphetamines, amphetamines, or other forms of speed during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use any methamphetamines, amphetamines, or other forms of speed?

fields.name: s4p
fields.title: Benzodiazapine, anti-anxiety, and tranquilizer use count
fields.description: Number of times a person used any benzodiazepines, anti-anxiety drugs or tranquilizers (such as Ativan, Equanil, Dalmane, Deprol, Diazepam, Klonopin, Librium, Lortab, Meprobamate, Miltown, Prosom, Serax, Traxene, Valium, Verseed, Xanax) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use any benzodiazepines, anti-anxiety drugs or tranquilizers (such as Ativan, Equanil, Dalmane, Deprol, Diazepam, Klonopin, Librium, Lortab, Meprobamate, Miltown, Prosom, Serax, Traxene, Valium, Verseed, Xanax)?

fields.name: s4z
fields.title: Drug use count: other
fields.description: Number of days a person use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers)?

fields.name: s4z_describe
fields.title: Drug use: description of other drugs
fields.description: A description of drugs that have not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days(prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers)? (Please describe )

fields.name: s5
fields.title: Place of No Opioid Use (Jail, Hospital, etc)
fields.description: Number of days a person has been in jail, hospital, or other place where they could not use heroin, fentanyl, other opioids, alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/ since your last assessment), on how many days have you been in a jail, hospital or other place where you could not use heroin, fentanyl, other opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other drugs? (USE 0 FOR NONE)

fields.name: j1a
fields.title: Activities against law besides drugs
fields.description: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), on how many days were a person involved in any activities that might get a person into trouble or be against the law besides drug use? [IF 0, GO TO J2]

custom.notes: [IF 0, GO TO J2]
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), on how many days were you involved in any activities that might get you into trouble or be against the law besides drug use? [IF 0, GO TO J2]

fields.name: j1a1
fields.title: Drug possession
fields.description: Number of times  a person  been in possession of small amounts of drugs? (drug possession)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been in possession of small amounts of drugs? (drug possession)

fields.name: j1a2
fields.title: Drunkenness or other liquor law violations
fields.description: Number of times  a person  been drunk or high in public? (drunkenness or other liquor law violations)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been drunk or high in public? (drunkenness or other liquor law violations)

fields.name: j1a3
fields.title: Driving under the influence or while intoxicated
fields.description: Number of times  a person  driven a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs? (driving under the influence or while intoxicated)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  driven a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs? (driving under the influence or while intoxicated)

fields.name: j1a4
fields.title: Possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs
fields.description: Number of times  a person …sold, distributed or helped to make illegal drugs?  (possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you …sold, distributed or helped to make illegal drugs?  (possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs)

fields.name: j1a5
fields.title: Vandalism or property destruction
fields.description: Number of times  a person  purposely damaged or destroyed property that did not belong to a person? (vandalism or property destruction)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  purposely damaged or destroyed property that did not belong to you? (vandalism or property destruction)

fields.name: j1a6
fields.title: Receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods
fields.description: Number of times  a person  bought, received, possessed or sold any stolen goods? (receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  bought, received, possessed or sold any stolen goods? (receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods)

fields.name: j1a7
fields.title: Forgery, fraud or embezzlement
fields.description: Number of times  a person  passed bad checks, forged or altered a prescription, or took money illegally from an employer?  (forgery, fraud or embezzlement)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  passed bad checks, forged or altered a prescription, or took money illegally from an employer?  (forgery, fraud or embezzlement)

fields.name: j1a8
fields.title: Shoplifting
fields.description: Number of times  a person  taken something from a store without paying for it? (shoplifting)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken something from a store without paying for it? (shoplifting)

fields.name: j1a9
fields.title: Larceny or theft
fields.description: Number of times  a person  other than from a store, taken money or property that didn't belong to a person? (larceny or theft)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  other than from a store, taken money or property that didn't belong to you? (larceny or theft)

fields.name: j1a10
fields.title: Burglary or breaking and entering
fields.description: Number of times  a person  broken into a house or building to steal something or just to look around? (burglary or breaking and entering)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  broken into a house or building to steal something or just to look around? (burglary or breaking and entering)

fields.name: j1a11
fields.title: Motor vehicle theft
fields.description: Number of times  a person  taken a car without people in it that didn't belong to a person? (motor vehicle theft)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken a car without people in it that didn't belong to you? (motor vehicle theft)

fields.name: j1a12
fields.title: Carjacking
fields.description: Number of times  a person  taken a car from someone who was in it? (carjacking)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken a car from someone who was in it? (carjacking)

fields.name: j1a13
fields.title: Simple assault or battery
fields.description: Number of times  a person  hit someone or gotten into a physical fight? (simple assault or battery)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  hit someone or gotten into a physical fight? (simple assault or battery)

fields.name: j1a14
fields.title: Robbery
fields.description: Number of times  a person  used a weapon, force, or strong-arm methods to get money or things from a person? (robbery)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  used a weapon, force, or strong-arm methods to get money or things from a person? (robbery)

fields.name: j1a15
fields.title: Aggravated assault or battery
fields.description: Number of times  a person  hurt someone badly enough they needed bandages or a doctor? (aggravated assault or battery)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  hurt someone badly enough they needed bandages or a doctor? (aggravated assault or battery)

fields.name: j1a16
fields.title: Forcible rape
fields.description: Number of times  a person  made someone have sex with a person by force when they did not want to have sex? (forcible rape)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  made someone have sex with you by force when they did not want to have sex? (forcible rape)

fields.name: j1a17
fields.title: Murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter
fields.description: Number of times  a person  been involved in the death or murder of another person, including accidents? (murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been involved in the death or murder of another person, including accidents? (murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter)

fields.name: j1a18
fields.title: Arson
fields.description: Number of times  a person  intentionally set a building, car or other property on fire? (arson)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  intentionally set a building, car or other property on fire? (arson)

fields.name: j1a19
fields.title: Prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex
fields.description: Number of times  a person  traded sex for food, drugs or money? (prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  traded sex for food, drugs or money? (prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex)

fields.name: j1a99
fields.title: Other unlawful activities
fields.description: Number of times  a person  done something else that would have gotten a person into trouble with the police if they had known about it? (carrying a weapon, gang involvement, domestic violence, trespass, gambling, distributing the peace, disorderly conduct, paraphernalia, runaway, curfew, truancy,  ) (PLEASE DESCRIBE)

custom.notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  done something else that would have gotten you into trouble with the police if they had known about it? (carrying a weapon, gang involvement, domestic violence, trespass, gambling, distributing the peace, disorderly conduct, paraphernalia, runaway, curfew, truancy,  ) (PLEASE DESCRIBE)

fields.name: j2
fields.title: Overall charged arrests
fields.description: Number of a times person was arrested and charged

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times were you arrested and charged?

fields.name: j3a
fields.title: Electronic monitoring
fields.description: Number of days person has been on electronic monitoring

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  on electronic monitoring?

fields.name: j3b
fields.title: House arrest
fields.description: Number of days a person has been on house arrest

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  on house arrest?

fields.name: j3c
fields.title: Jail time
fields.description: Number of days a person has been in jail

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  in jail?

fields.name: j3d
fields.title: Prison time
fields.description: Number of days a person has been in prison

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  in prison?

fields.name: j3e
fields.title: Current jail or prison
fields.description: Person is currently in jail or prison

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you currently in jail or prison? (CAN MARK IF OBVIOUS)

fields.name: j3f
fields.title: Length of jail or prison time
fields.description: Length of jail or prison time for this episode

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: How long have you been in jail or prison? (just this episode)

fields.name: j4a
fields.title: Parole
fields.description: Number of days a person has been on parole

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on parole?

fields.name: j4b
fields.title: Probation
fields.description: Number of days a person has been on probation

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on probation?

fields.name: j4c
fields.title: Other kind of community supervision
fields.description: Number of days a person has been on any other kind of community supervision

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on any other kind of community supervision?

fields.name: j4d
fields.title: Meeting with probation or parole officer
fields.description: Number of days a person has met with a probation or parole officer

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you met with your probation or parole officer?

fields.name: j4e
fields.title: Trouble with probation or parole officer
fields.description: Number of days a person has been in trouble with a probation or parole officer

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been in trouble with your probation or parole officer?

fields.name: j5a
fields.title: Life time arrests
fields.description: Number of days a person has been arrested in their lifetime (including juvenile)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how many times in your life have you been arrested including as a juvenile?

fields.name: j5b
fields.title: First time arrest
fields.description: Age at time of first arrest

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how old were you the first time you were arrested?

fields.name: j5c_years
fields.title: Lifetime years in detention, jail, or prison time
fields.description: Number of times a person has spent in detention, jail or prison during a personr lifetime?

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how much total time have you spent in detention, jail or prison during your lifetime?

fields.name: j5c_months
fields.title: Lifetime months in detention, jail, or prison time
fields.description: Number of times a person has spent in detention, jail or prison during lifetime

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how much total time have you spent in detention, jail or prison during your lifetime?

fields.name: j5d
fields.title: Lifetime guity and sentenced
fields.description: Number of times a person has been found guilty and sentenced (including adjudications as a a personth or convictions as an adult)

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how many times have you been found guilty and sentenced (including adjudications as a youth or convictions as an adult)?

fields.name: j5e
fields.title: First time adjudication conviction
fields.description: Age at which a person was first adjudicated and convicted

custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how old were you the first time you were adjudicated or convicted?

description: Time point Fields: Measures collected at all time points (baseline and follow ups)
